author: dkhaywood
msg: NOF: Added DateTimeAdapter (handles java.util.Date as date/time, replacing DateAdapter that handled java.util.Date as only date); added DateOnlyAdapter (handles java.sql.Date); added TimeOnlyAdapter (handles java.sql.Time).

author: rcmatthews
msg: moved the examples back to the root directory so Eclipse can import them

author: dkhaywood
msg: NO RCP: calendar view, disable resizing of events.

msg: NO RCP: use gridlayout(3) rather than 5; remove spacers.
